rules_text:
Colossal 2–{4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with two +1/+1 counters; or pay {4}{B}{B} as a sorcery: Put two +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
Menace
When Wretched Catoblepas’s colossal ability puts one or more counters on it, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
